### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customers_segmentation (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  occupation VARCHAR(50),
  behavior VARCHAR(50),
  preferences VARCHAR(50)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customers_segmentation SET age = 35 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Customers (
 customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(50),
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 location VARCHAR(100)
);


CREATE TABLE Segmentation (
 segmentation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_id INT,
 demographics VARCHAR(100),
 behavior VARCHAR(100),
 preferences VARCHAR(100),
 CONSTRAINT fk_customer_id FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
